alert.note: Alert for Benton; Henry (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 22 at 4:26PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Benton and northeastern Henry Counties through 500 PM CDT... At 425 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Paris Landing State Park, moving south at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Paris Landing State Park, Springville, Haigler Ridge, Sunnyside, Pine Hill, Old Springville, Buchanan and Big Sandy Unit Tennessee National Wildlife Refuge. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
